General.Name: Thesis Gold Inc
General.Description: Thesis Gold (Holdings) Inc. acquires, explores for, and develops gold and mineral properties. It holds interest in the Ranch gold project that comprises 31 contiguous mineral claims covering an area of 17,832 hectares located in the Tooddogone Region of northern British Columbia. The company was formerly known as Thesis Gold Inc. and changed its name to Thesis Gold (Holdings) Inc. in August 2023. Thesis Gold (Holdings) Inc. is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1111 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 2J3
